verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> assurance <S%G5287><s%> of things hoped for, <S%G1679><s%> proof <S%G1650><s%> of things <S%G4229><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> seen. <S%G991><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> this, <S%G3778><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> obtained testimony. <S%G3140><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> we understand <S%G3539><s%> that <S%G2675><s%> the universe <S%G165><s%> has been framed <S%G2675><s%> by the word <S%G4487><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> so that <S%G1519><s%> what is seen <S%G991><s%> has <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> been made <S%G1096><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> things which are visible. <S%G5316><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Abel <S%G6><s%> offered <S%G4374><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> a more excellent <S%G4119><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> Cain, <S%G2535><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had testimony <S%G3140><s%> given to him that he was <S%G1511><s%> righteous, <S%G1342><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> testifying <S%G3140><s%> with respect to <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> gifts; <S%G1435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> it <S%G846><s%> he, <S%G599><s%> being dead, still <S%G2089><s%> speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Enoch <S%G1802><s%> was taken away, <S%G3346><s%> so that <S%G3361><s%> he wouldn't <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3361><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he was <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> found, <S%G2147><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> translated <S%G3346><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> he has had testimony <S%G3140><s%> given to him that before <S%G4253><s%> his <S%G846><s%> translation <S%G3331><s%> he had been well pleasing <S%G2100><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G4102><s%> Without <S%G5565><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> it is impossible <S%G102><s%> to be well pleasing <S%G2100><s%> to him, <S%G1063><s%> for he who comes <S%G4334><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he exists, <S%G2076><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that he is <S%G2076><s%> a rewarder <S%G3406><s%> of those who seek <S%G1567><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Noah, <S%G3575><s%> being warned about <S%G4012><s%> things <S%G991><s%> not <S%G3369><s%> yet <S%G3369><s%> seen, <S%G991><s%> moved with godly <S%G5537><s%> fear, <S%G2125><s%> prepared <S%G2680><s%> a ship <S%G2787><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the saving <S%G4991><s%> of <S%G3624><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he condemned <S%G2632><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> heir <S%G2818><s%> of the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is according <S%G2596><s%> to faith. <S%G4102><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> when he was called, <S%G2564><s%> obeyed <S%G5219><s%> to go out <S%G1831><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he was to <S%G3195><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> an inheritance. <S%G2817><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He went out, <S%G1831><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> knowing <S%G1987><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> he went. <S%G2064><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> he lived <S%G3939><s%> as an alien in <S%G1519><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> of promise, <S%G1860><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in a land <S%G245><s%> not his own, <S%G2730><s%> dwelling in <S%G1722><s%> tents, <S%G4633><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> the heirs with him <S%G4789><s%> of the same <S%G846><s%> promise. <S%G1860><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he looked for <S%G1551><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> which has <S%G2192><s%> the foundations, <S%G2310><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> builder <S%G5079><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> maker <S%G1217><s%> is God. <S%G2316><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> Sarah <S%G4564><s%> herself <S%G846><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> conceive, <S%G2602><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she bore a <S%G2540><s%> child <S%G5088><s%> when she was past <S%G3844><s%> <S%G2540><s%> age, <S%G2244><s%> since <S%G1893><s%> she counted <S%G2233><s%> him <S%G1861><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> who had promised. <S%G1861><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> as many as <S%G2531><s%> the stars of <S%G575><s%> the sky in multitude, <S%G4128><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> innumerable <S%G382><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> the sand <S%G285><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> shore, <S%G5491><s%> were fathered <S%G1080><s%> by <S%G575><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> man, <S%G2532><s%> and him <S%G5023><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> good as dead. <S%G3499><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> died <S%G599><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> having received <S%G2983><s%> the promises, <S%G1860><s%> but <S%G235><s%> having seen <S%G1492><s%> them <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> embraced <S%G782><s%> them from afar, <S%G4207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> having confessed <S%G3670><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%> strangers <S%G3581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> pilgrims <S%G3927><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> those who say <S%G3004><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> make it clear <S%G1718><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they are seeking <S%G1934><s%> a country of their own. <S%G3968><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> they had been thinking <S%G3421><s%> of that <S%G1565><s%> country from <S%G575><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they went out, <S%G1831><s%> they would have had <S%G2192><s%> enough <S%G302><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> to return. <S%G344><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> they desire <S%G3713><s%> a better <S%G2909><s%> country, <S%G5124><s%> that is, <S%G2076><s%> a heavenly <S%G2032><s%> one. <S%G1352><s%> Therefore God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G1870><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of them, <S%G846><s%> to be called <S%G1941><s%> their <S%G846><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he has prepared <S%G2090><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> for them. <S%G846><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> being tested, <S%G3985><s%> offered up <S%G4374><s%> Isaac. <S%G2464><s%> Yes, <S%G2532><s%> he who had gladly received <S%G324><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%> was offering up <S%G4374><s%> his one and only son; <S%G3439><s%>

even he to <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it was said, <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3754><s%> "In <S%G1722><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> will <S%G2564><s%> your <S%G4671><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> be called; <S%G2564><s%>"

concluding <S%G3049><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1415><s%> to raise <S%G1453><s%> up <S%G1453><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%> Figuratively <S%G3850><s%> speaking, <S%G2532><s%> he also did receive <S%G2865><s%> him <S%G846><s%> back from <S%G1537><s%> the dead. <S%G3498><s%>
By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Isaac <S%G2464><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> Jacob <S%G2384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Esau, <S%G2269><s%> even concerning <S%G4012><s%> things to come. <S%G3195><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> when he was dying, <S%G599><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped, <S%G4352><s%> leaning on <S%G1909><s%> the top <S%G206><s%> of <S%G4464><s%> his <S%G846><s%> staff. <S%G4464><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> when his end <S%G5053><s%> was near, <S%G3421><s%> made mention of <S%G4012><s%> the departure <S%G1841><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel; <S%G2474><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave instructions <S%G1781><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bones. <S%G3747><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> when he was born, <S%G1080><s%> was hidden <S%G2928><s%> for three months <S%G5150><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> his <S%G846><s%> parents, <S%G3962><s%> because <S%G1360><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> that he was a beautiful <S%G791><s%> child, <S%G3813><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they were <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> afraid <S%G5399><s%> of <S%G1297><s%> the king <S%G935><s%>'s commandment. <S%G1297><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Moses, <S%G3475><s%> when he had grown <S%G1096><s%> up, <S%G3173><s%> refused <S%G720><s%> to be called <S%G3004><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of <S%G2364><s%> Pharaoh <S%G5328><s%>'s daughter, <S%G2364><s%>

choosing <S%G138><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> to share ill treatment with <S%G4778><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s people, <S%G2992><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> to enjoy <S%G2192><s%> the pleasures <S%G619><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> for a time; <S%G4340><s%>

accounting <S%G2233><s%> the reproach <S%G3680><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> greater <S%G3173><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> than the treasures <S%G2344><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> Egypt; <S%G125><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he looked <S%G578><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the reward. <S%G3405><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> he left <S%G2641><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> fearing <S%G5399><s%> the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of the king; <S%G935><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he endured, <S%G2594><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> seeing <S%G3708><s%> him who is invisible. <S%G517><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> he kept <S%G4160><s%> the Passover, <S%G3957><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sprinkling <S%G4378><s%> of the blood, <S%G2443><s%> that the destroyer <S%G3645><s%> of the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> should not <S%G3361><s%> touch <S%G2345><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> they passed through <S%G1224><s%> the <S%G2281><s%> Red <S%G2063><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> on <S%G1223><s%> dry <S%G3584><s%> land. <S%G3739><s%> When the Egyptians <S%G124><s%> tried <S%G3984><s%> to do <S%G2983><s%> so, <S%G2666><s%> they were swallowed up.
By faith, <S%G4102><s%> the walls <S%G5038><s%> of Jericho <S%G2410><s%> fell down, <S%G4098><s%> after they had been encircled <S%G2944><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%>

By faith, <S%G4102><s%> Rahab <S%G4460><s%> the prostitute, <S%G4204><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> perish <S%G4881><s%> with <S%G4881><s%> those who were disobedient, <S%G544><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> the spies <S%G2685><s%> in <S%G3326><s%> peace. <S%G1515><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> shall I <S%G3004><s%> say? <S%G3004><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> would fail <S%G1952><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> if I told <S%G1334><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> Gideon, <S%G1066><s%> Barak, <S%G913><s%> Samson, <S%G4546><s%> Jephthah, <S%G2422><s%> David, <S%G1138><s%> Samuel, <S%G4545><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> the prophets; <S%G4396><s%>

who, <S%G3739><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> subdued <S%G2610><s%> kingdoms, <S%G932><s%> worked <S%G2038><s%> out righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> obtained <S%G2013><s%> promises, <S%G1860><s%> stopped <S%G5420><s%> the mouths <S%G4750><s%> of lions, <S%G3023><s%>

quenched <S%G4570><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> escaped <S%G5343><s%> the edge <S%G4750><s%> of the sword, <S%G3162><s%> from <S%G575><s%> weakness <S%G769><s%> were made strong, <S%G1743><s%> grew <S%G1096><s%> mighty <S%G2478><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> war, <S%G4171><s%> and caused foreign <S%G245><s%> armies <S%G3925><s%> to flee. <S%G2827><s%>

Women <S%G1135><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> their <S%G846><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> were tortured, <S%G5178><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> accepting <S%G4327><s%> their deliverance, <S%G629><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they might obtain <S%G5177><s%> a better <S%G2909><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Others <S%G2087><s%> were <S%G2983><s%> tried <S%G3984><s%> by <S%G1701><s%> mocking <S%G1701><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> scourging, <S%G3148><s%> yes, <S%G2089><s%> moreover <S%G1161><s%> by bonds <S%G1199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> imprisonment. <S%G5438><s%>

They were stoned. <S%G3034><s%> They were sawn apart. <S%G4249><s%> They were tempted. <S%G3985><s%> They were slain <S%G5408><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword. <S%G3162><s%> They went around in <S%G1722><s%> sheep skins <S%G1192><s%> and <S%G1722><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> goat <S%G122><s%> skins; <S%G1192><s%> being destitute, <S%G5302><s%> afflicted, <S%G2346><s%> ill-treated <S%G2558><s%>

(of whom <S%G3739><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%>), wandering <S%G4105><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> deserts, <S%G2047><s%> mountains, <S%G3735><s%> caves, <S%G4693><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the holes <S%G3692><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> having had testimony <S%G3140><s%> given to them through <S%G1223><s%> their faith, <S%G4102><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G2865><s%> the promise, <S%G1860><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> having provided <S%G4265><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> thing <S%G5100><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from us <S%G2257><s%> they should <S%G5048><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be made perfect. <S%G5048><s%>
